entry.title: Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning
entry.content: 🎥 Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning, 2025 ⭐️ ★★★½ Even as a standalone, this would’ve been a smash hit.<n>The action is spectacular, the locations are stunning, and the set pieces are jaw-dropping.<n>But what makes it click is that... 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/mission-impossible-the-final-reckoning/ #FilmReview

entry.title: The Three Musketeers
entry.content: 🎥 The Three Musketeers, 1973 ⭐️ ★★★½ The first part leans heavily on action, and while not all the fight sequences are particularly well executed, when they are done with humor and flair, it’s pure delight .<n>What really holds the film to... 🔗 https://letterboxd.com/julienpierre/film/the-three-musketeers-1973/1/ #FilmReview
